questions.question: Please input a 'What Is' question relevant to your language here.
questions.details: Expanded information on the correct answer to the question goes here.
questions.shortAns: Please input a short ''It is'' Ans to the question above here that ends with punctuation.

questions.question: What is a dog?
questions.details: The dog is characterized by an upturning tail. The dog derived from an ancient, extinct wolf, and the modern grey wolf is the dog's nearest living relative.
questions.shortAns: It is a domesticated descendant of the wolf.

questions.question: Is a train characterized by a rail transport?
questions.details: It is a form of transport consisting of a series of connected vehicles that generally run along a railroad track to transport passengers or cargo. The word train comes from the Old French trahiner, derived from the Latin trahere meaning

questions.question: Is programming worth lerning?
questions.details: Programming is the future. As the technology increases so does the demnd for proramming jobs.

questions.question: What is programming?
questions.details: Programming is the process of creating a set of instructions that tell a computer how to perform a task.
questions.shortAns: It is the process or activity of writing computer programs.

questions.question: Why to learn programming?
questions.details: Proramming is the future of this world. It will dominate the world. Everything around is technology or because of technology(like the mobile phones, T.V , AC , etc)
questions.shortAns: It is an exercise for your brain that eventually improves your problem-solving and logical ability.
